CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1952, pg. 6 reads: "Inspecting Tumpson Company Gifts - Mary Dee, well-known WHOD radio personality, is shown as she inspects stainless steel cutlery sets and Fiesta Ware dinner sets at Tumpson and Company, which firm will give a choice of either set to Courier readers with any purchase between now and Christmas. Ralph Ellison, Tumpson Company representative, demonstrates the gifts."
TitMainTitle: Tumpson Company representative Ralph Ellison, and Mary Dee, seated at table looking over display of Fiesta Ware and knives in Tumpson and Company showroom
